item.title: Practical Service Design - guides, resources, and community
item.description:
Practical Service Design - guides, resources, and community

Our world is now made of services. We need new tools to think across this space, to not only create memorable and valuable experiences for our customers, but also empower our organizations to change the way we do business for the better.

item.title: Video: What is service design?
item.description:
Video: What is service design?

Design Methods Step 1: Discover Step one in a four-part guide for anyone who wants to understand the methods designers use and try them out for themselves. Discover - keep your perspectives wide, allowing for a broad range of ideas and influences.

item.title: Katie Koch // Putting Service Design Into Practice // Service Experience Conference 2015

Katie Koch // Putting Service Design Into Practice // Service Experience Conference 2015

item.title: UI Motion Design References
item.description:
UI Motion Design References

There are quite a few things I like to do before opening my computer and using a design tool like Sketch of Photoshop. One of the first things I do is a competitive analysis and right after some simple mood boards with references for things like animation, typography, colors, simplicity.

item.title: Can you Code this UI Concept? Vol. 2 - Design, Code and Prototyping
item.description:
Can you Code this UI Concept? Vol. 2 - Design, Code and Prototyping

Five (awesome) UI concepts and their CodePen implementation.

item.title: The sound of empowerment
item.description:
The sound of empowerment

GN ReSound and Designit have partnered together to put personalisation and control back in the hands of the users, with the first hearing aid interface for the Apple Watch. Developing innovative new solutions for hearing loss has been a common goal for Designit and GN ReSound, a global market leader in hearing care solutions, since first working together in 2013.
